Name: Fantasy Quest Solitaire
About the game: At the very last moment the idyllic Fairy Land and its peaceful denizens were saved from the dark shadows. But now everything's changed! The fight against evil has left its marks all over the kingdom. It's a huge mess! King Feodor once again needs your help to restore peace and order in his realm. The mail system is no longer working at all, and all scrolls have been randomly scattered all over the realm. The three Towers of the Elements which provide the lands with energy are no longer under control and need to be recalibrated immediately to prevent even more mayhem. And it's become obvious that the threats of pollution haven't been banished in some parts of the realm. Many fairies have become lost and confused amidst the chaos. Only a special potion could help them. A total of nine challenging tasks like adventure, hidden object and puzzle levels await you. Are you ready to face this challenge? Play your cards right in almost 100 Solitaire levels and save the Fairy Land. 4 courageous elves will help you with their magical powers! Premium Solitaire Card-Game Almost 100 engaging Solitaire levels Numerous power-ups and useful wild cards Show your wits in exciting Match 3 mini games Conquer 3 awesome adventure levels Master 3 tricky hidden object levels Play through 3 challenging puzzle levels Solve critical time management quests Entertaining mini games of various genres Beautiful particle and sound effects Hand-drawn art by Marie Beschorner MORE OF OUR GREAT CASUAL GAMES
